title: Resizing an UWP app window sometimes triggers dwm.exe crash
body: I am on latest 1903 build. Sometimes, when i resize some any UWP app's window, i experience full screen "black-out" and then it restores. In event log i see that dwm.exe crashed. This issue reproduces with ANY app build on UWP platform: for it most frequently used are Settings, Calculator, and 3rdparty Unigram.
